item.title: Not all bear markets are equal
item.description: Analysis on bear markets from their peak to the trough. The data for peak and trough values is extracted from Yardeni Research Comparison between the last 4 bear markets Here is how the performance looks like during those periods Performance break down during each bear market Dot-com bubble burst Global Financial Crises Covid-19 Crash 2022 Downturn

item.title: [2020-11-21] ETFs momentum report
item.description: ETF Momentum Report Top 20 Macro ETFs based on momentum on week ending 2020-11-21 XLI (Industrials) Metric Value Momentum 20.83 3 Months Gain 11.04 times Yearly Gain 1.76 times Links: Y Finance | Y Chart | BarChart | ChartMill | StockInvest | TradingView EWJ (Japan) Metric Value Momentum 12.67 3 Months Gain 9.54 times Yearly Gain 1.47 times Links: Y Finance | Y Chart | BarChart | ChartMill | StockInvest | TradingView
